com.buabook.exacttarget.fuelsdk

Class AutoRefreshETClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.exacttarget.fuelsdk.ETClient
      • com.buabook.exacttarget.fuelsdk.AutoRefreshETClient

  • public class AutoRefreshETClient
extends com.exacttarget.fuelsdk.ETClient

    ETClient with Auto Refresh of Refresh Token

    The default ETClient does not refresh the refresh token and, as per OAuth standards, expires after 14 days. This class extends ETClient and force refreshes the token after the configured amount of time.

    NOTE: Due to the methods available to sub-classes, when the refresh token requires refreshing, 2 API calls will be made to ExactTarget. Normal access token refreshes will behave as before.

    (c) 2016 Sport Trades Ltd

    License GPLv3

    Since:
    8 Dec 2016
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jas Rajasansir

      • newRefreshClient

        public static AutoRefreshETClient newRefreshClient(String file,
                                                   Duration refreshTokenLife)
                                            throws com.exacttarget.fuelsdk.ETSdkException
        Provides a functionally equivalent version of ETClient with automatic refresh of the refresh token based on the supplied duration
        Parameters:
        refreshTokenLife - The duration between refresh token refreshes. Pass null to use the default (DEFAULT_REFRESH_TOKEN_LIFE)
        Returns:
        A new client with auto refresh of the refresh token enabled
        Throws:
        com.exacttarget.fuelsdk.ETSdkException
        See Also:
        ETClient.ETClient(String)
